text: wandhr - 'ayuha alrasul - alnaas yawm alnadamat hin yuqda alamr, wyuja' balmwt kannah kbsh amlh, fyudhbah, wyufsl bayn alkhlq, fysyr 'ahl al'iiman 'iilaa aljnt, wa'ahl alkufr 'iilaa alnar, wahum alyawm fi hadhih aldunya fi ghaflat emma 'undhru bh, fahum la ysdqwn, wala yaemalun aleamal alsalh
